construct a landsimR landscape LandscapeObj type

Source: R/Landscape-class.R
LandscapeObj.Rd

A short description...

Usage

LandscapeObj(landscape, classType)

Arguments

landscape

matrix landscape matrix

classType

numeric class types: polygon = 1, curve = 2, line = 3

Value

Landscape landscape object

Examples

LandscapeObj(landscape, c(1, 1, 1, 1, 2, 3))
#> LandscapeObj 
#>  landscape:  matrix array  dim: 100 100 
#>      class:  0 1 2 3 4 5 
#>  classType:  1 1 1 1 2 3
